channel.title: Regression on GenStud
channel.description: Recent content in Regression on GenStud

item.title: Simple Linear Regression and Polynomial Linear Regression
item.description: In this post, we’ll talk about Simple Linear Regression and Polynomial Linear Regression. These two represent the backbone for linear and continuous regressions. There’s also Multiple Linear Regression but it requires a small chat about model building, so it’ll be the content for a future post. First things first, let’s dive deep into what is Regression. Regression can be defined as a set of statistical processes that are trying to estimate the relationship between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables, creating a model that best fits the data.
